attributes.action: Sack any MP who has swopped his second home for financial gain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Any MP who has swopped which house is his main/2nd home for financial gain must GO & Go now. i dont care about claiming expenses for moat cleaning or light bulbs, but to swop the 2nd home back & forth just to fleece the tax payers out of more cash is morally bankrupt.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
